reviewText:
I also have this movie on a "Mystery Classics" disk, from Echo Bridge. The Mystery Classics version is almost unwatchable, the sound is so atrocious.

That's why I took a chance on buying this one, from Sinister Cinema. The sound is much better -- very listenable.

I love Patricia Farr's wisecracks in this movie. It's nice to hear them clearly, not in a haze of distortion.
